mapper.sql: DUTY_TYPE, DUTY_NAME, GENERAL, DUTY_TIME1, DUTY_TIME2, DUTY_TIME3, DUTY_TIME4, DUTY_TIME5, DUTY_TIME6, DUTY_TYPE1, DUTY_TYPE2, DUTY_TYPE3, DUTY_TYPE4, DUTY_TYPE5, DUTY_TYPE6
mapper.insert: insert into attend_config (DUTY_TYPE, DUTY_NAME, GENERAL, DUTY_TIME1, DUTY_TIME2, DUTY_TIME3, DUTY_TIME4, DUTY_TIME5, DUTY_TIME6, DUTY_TYPE1, DUTY_TYPE2, DUTY_TYPE3, DUTY_TYPE4, DUTY_TYPE5, DUTY_TYPE6 ) values (#{dutyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dutyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyTime3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyTime4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyTime5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyTime6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyType1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyType2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyType3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyType4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyType5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyType6,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update attend_config
DUTY_NAME = #{dutyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENERAL = #{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TIME1 = #{dutyTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TIME2 = #{dutyTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TIME3 = #{dutyTime3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TIME4 = #{dutyTime4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TIME5 = #{dutyTime5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TIME6 = #{dutyTime6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY_TYPE1 = #{dutyType1,jdbcType=CHAR},
DUTY_TYPE2 = #{dutyType2,jdbcType=CHAR},
DUTY_TYPE3 = #{dutyType3,jdbcType=CHAR},
DUTY_TYPE4 = #{dutyType4,jdbcType=CHAR},
DUTY_TYPE5 = #{dutyType5,jdbcType=CHAR},
DUTY_TYPE6 = #{dutyType6,jdbcType=CHAR},
where DUTY_TYPE = #{dutyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update attend_config set DUTY_NAME = #{dutyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENERAL = #{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TIME1 = #{dutyTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TIME2 = #{dutyTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TIME3 = #{dutyTime3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TIME4 = #{dutyTime4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TIME5 = #{dutyTime5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TIME6 = #{dutyTime6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY_TYPE1 = #{dutyType1,jdbcType=CHAR}, DUTY_TYPE2 = #{dutyType2,jdbcType=CHAR}, DUTY_TYPE3 = #{dutyType3,jdbcType=CHAR}, DUTY_TYPE4 = #{dutyType4,jdbcType=CHAR}, DUTY_TYPE5 = #{dutyType5,jdbcType=CHAR}, DUTY_TYPE6 = #{dutyType6,jdbcType=CHAR} where DUTY_TYPE = #{dutyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT c.DUTY_TYPE,b.DUTY_NAME,b.GENERAL,b.DUTY_TIME1,b.DUTY_TIME2,b.DUTY_TIME3,b.DUTY_TIME4,b.DUTY_TIME5,b.DUTY_TIME6 from USER a left join user_ext c on a.user_id = c.user_id left join ATTEND_CONFIG b on c.DUTY_TYPE=b.DUTY_TYPE where a.BYNAME=#{pin}
